channel.title: Bread on cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Bread on cookbook

item.title: Pita Bread
item.description: Pita Bread Ingredients 240ml warm water 7g yeast 5g salt 25g olive oil 345g all-purpose flour (70% hydration) Methodology Combine ingredients. Knead dough for one minute. Knead again for 2 minutes at a time with 10 minute rests, twice. Total knead time of 5 minutes. Proof dough 1 hour. Preheat over to 475F with a large baking tile on the bottom shelf. Divide dough into 8 balls. Rest for 10 minutes.

item.title: Pretzels
item.description: Pretzels Ingredients 350ml warm water 7g yeast 5g salt 12g brown sugar or granulated sugar 12g melted butter 500g all-purpose flour (70% hydration) Methodology Combine ingredients. Knead dough. Proof dough 2 hours. Shape dough into pretzels or 30g balls. Boil in a baking soda path, 20 seconds per side. Add a butter or egg wash. Sprinkle flakey salt over top. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 15 minutes.

item.title: Soft Bread Rolls
item.description: Prep time Cook Time Additional Time Total Time 25 minutes 10 minutes 3 Hours 3 Hours 35 Minutes Ingredients 160 ml warm water 6 g instant yeast 300 g flour 6 g coarse salt 50 g sugar 56 g softened butter 1 whole egg, beaten Methodology Warm milk to 100 F/38 C, add the instant yeast and stir together. Let activate for 5 minutes. Mix the flour, salt, and sugar in a large bowl.

item.title: Cornbread
item.description: Prep time Cook Time Additional Time Total Time 20 minutes 20 minutes None 40 Minutes Ingredients 335 grams cornmeal 88 grams all-purpose flour 9 grams baking powder 7 grams salt 120 grams cups sugar 2 Eggs / 95 grams 55g Butter 380 grams milk Methodology Preheat the oven to 400 F (200 C). Soften the butter. Combine with the sugar and egg until creamy. Mix the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.

item.title: Focaccia
item.description: Ingredients 400 grams bread flour 4 grams instant yeast 7 grams kosher salt 400 grams water - warm (80F) 20 grams extra-virgin olive oil Methodology Combine flour, salt, and yeast in large bowl. Add water and olive oil. Mix for 2 minutes. Proof mixture in fridge for 24 hours, or at room temperature for 1 hour. Remove dough from refrigerator and let sit at room temperature for 10 minutes. Spread the dough onto the baking tray.

item.title: Bagels
item.description: Bagels Ingredients Bagels 6 g active dry yeast 19 g granulated sugar 300 ml warm water (± 60 ml) 440 g bread flour (60g of kneading) 6 g salt 17g diastatic malt powder (Optional) Bath Pot of water Brown sugar Methodology Combine 300ml of warm water, sugar, and yeast. Let sit for five minutes, then stir the yeast and sugar until dissolved. Mix the flour, salt, and malt powder in a large bowl.
